com.simsilica.lemur

Class DefaultCheckboxModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.lemur.DefaultCheckboxModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CheckboxModel, VersionedObject<java.lang.Boolean>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RollupPanel.OpenCheckboxModel

    public class DefaultCheckboxModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements CheckboxModel
    A default implementation of the CheckboxModel interface that simply stores a boolean state and increments the version when the state is changed.
